chun jia a retired office worker for a
food company said that singing red songs
was about giving thanks to the communist
party elders fought hard for us it's
only with their hard work that we can
enjoy the good life we have now the
struggle wasn't easy so we sing to
praise them while retirees gathered in

Chongqing shopping park another group of
